body:
### Welcome to CloudBees on github
At CloudBees we hand craft only the finest open source, artisanally (is that even a word?). 
This github group contains a lot of our open source - some are functional parts of the system for you to fork and use - others are libraries/utilities that we use and hope you find useful. Send us a pull request ! 

See us at http://developer.cloudbees.com

### Jenkins

We are big supporters of Jenkins - this project is hosted over here: http://jenkins-ci.org/ for all your viewing pleasure. Some plugins you may find in this github group. 

If you have an open source project you want build via Jenkins for free - please to try out https://buildhive.cloudbees.com - all your need is your github account.


### ClickStarts you will find here
ClickStarts are pre-built stacks that people can build from - generally they are repos that end with 
```
-clickstart
```
So you can easily spot them. If you want to make your own - fork one that is similar - and go from there. Send us a pull request if you like.

### ClickStacks
ClickStacks are runtime containers that are used by cloudbees - these are forkable - each one contains instructions on how to use if you want to customise it to your own needs. 
These typically end with 
```
-clickstack
```
so you can easily spot them - crazy huh !


Use your favourite git or github client and enjoy !


### The rest?
A hodge podge of utilities and important tools. And perhaps some bad ideas. 

There are still some projects located at https://github.com/cloudbees as well.

### Authors and Contributors
All the cloudbees folks - and others form all over - look at each repo for credits and licences. 

### Erlang
A shady character also produces an excellent Erlang framework called e2 http://e2project.org/



### Talk to us
support@cloudbees.com - also http://stackoverflow.com/tags/cloudbees often offers a quick answer. 

you can reach us on irc 
```
#cloudbees on irc.freenode.net
```
There is also a google group for discussing these projects: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/cloudbees-dev - if you are forking something - please to chat about it here as we can help you out.

Keep up to date on the developer blog http://developer-blog.cloudbees.com

![CBLogo](https://www.cloudbees.com/sites/all/themes/custom/cloudbees_zen/css/bidesign/_ui/images/logo_small.png)

![Jenkins](https://buildhive.cloudbees.com/buildhive-ui/img/jenkins.png)
name: OpenSource @ CloudBees
